original: 孫權送曹操一頭大象，問遍手下不知其重量；曹沖年方五六，解題'以象入船、紀錄船舷水位、置換石塊'。
text: Sun Quan sent Cao Cao to an elephant, and asked all his men about its weight; Cao Chong was five or six years old, and solved the problem of'getting the elephant into the ship, recording the water level on the ship's side, and replacing stones'.
